extensions.description: Alternative screenshot capability that does not do fork n run by @codex_tf2
args: INT <-p pid> (0) {PID of the application whose window screenshot will be taken. If 0, then a full-screen screenshot}

extensions.description: Windows persistence techniques with flexible options controlled via command-line arguments
args: STRING <action> {Action to add or remove persistence 'add'/'rm'}
STRING <method> {Method to use for persistence 'reg','schtask' or 'startup'}
STRING <name> {Name identifier for the persistence entry}
STRING <path> {Full path to executable or script to run}
